channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: National Recording Registry adds Tracy Chapman, Hamilton and the Minecraft game soundtrack
item.description: There are 25 new additions to the Library of Congress collection. They include albums by Elton John, Miles Davis, Amy Winehouse, and the original cast...

item.title: Trump's new tariffs take effect. And, the firings of federal workers can proceed
item.description: Trump's new sweeping tariffs took effect after midnight. China says it's toughing out the trade war. And, the Supreme Court ruled that firings of thou...

item.title: NOAA contracts are being reviewed one by one. It's throwing the agency into chaos
item.description: NOAA relies on hundreds of contracts to keep the agency running. The new commerce secretary is reviewing many of them individually, causing disruption...

item.title: Sen. Maria Cantwell says there is bipartisan support to rein Trump's tariffs

item.title: How Trump's immigration policies could worsen the health care worker shortage
item.description: Hospitals and nursing homes rely on the immigrant workforce to fill many key roles, research finds. Trump's crackdown on immigration threatens to exac...

item.title: Trump administration halts $1 billion in federal funding for Cornell, $790 million for Northwestern
Ancient altar found in jungle apparently used for child sacrifices
item.description: The discovery shows the cultural interaction between the Maya of Tikal and Teotihuacan's elite between 300 and 500 A.D., archaeologists said.

item.title: Trump's sweeping new tariffs in effect, including 104% on China
item.description: President Trump's tariffs on imports from dozens of countries kicked in Wednesday, including 104% on goods from China, dramatically ramping up a poten...

item.title: Powerful cartel commander, 8 other members killed in Colombia
item.description: Days after the death of a top Gulf Clan commander, the military said it had killed eight more of the cartel's members and taken two captive.

item.title: Nursing home fire in China kills 20 people
item.description: Authorities have detained the person in charge of the facility as they investigate the cause of the fire.

item.title: Sneak peek: The Day My Mother Never Came Home

item.title: Trump's tariffs are a huge blow to Vietnam's economic ambitions
item.description: US exports have driven the economic success of countries like Vietnam and Cambodia.

item.title: Death toll tops 100 in roof collapse at nightclub in Dominican Republic
item.description: The roof of the Jet Set nightclub in Santo Domingo collapsed on a crowd, killing at least 113 people and leaving many others injured or trapped under ...

item.title: Ukraine captures two Chinese nationals fighting for Russia
item.description: President Zelensky says two soldiers were captured while fighting in Ukraine's Donetsk region.

item.title: Three Americans jailed over failed DR Congo coup returned home
item.description: Details of the repatriation are not known but it comes amid talks about a mineral deal between the two countries.

item.title: China calls for world to unite against Trump's 'trade tyranny'
item.description: Manufacturers and exporters are scrambling after 104% levy on China-made goods comes into effect.

item.title: Kentucky watches for surging rivers to recede so widespread cleanup can begin
item.description: After days of deluges overfilled rivers to near-record levels across Kentucky, residents are anxious to return to their flooded homes and assess what ...

item.title: Outrage builds as video shows Idaho police shooting a knife-wielding autistic teenager
